longInfo:
Passport required.
- Passports and other documents accepted for entry issued to
  nationals of Czech Rep. must be valid for the period of
  intended stay. 
Passport Exemptions:
- Holders of a National ID Card issued to nationals of Czech
  Rep.. 
- Holders of emergency or temporary passports issued to
  nationals of Czech Rep.

VISA NOT REQUIRED.

Minors:
- All minors who are nationals of Czech Rep. are expected to
  hold their own travel document. 
- WARNING! In accordance with European Union (EU) Legislation,
  all minors who are nationals of Czech Rep. will be expected
  to hold their own passport or National ID Card (where
  applicable) when departing from Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus,
  Romania or a Schengen Member State
